attributes.additional_details: Because coming out of EU was a huge mistake for the U.K. the EU has strength and U.K. is becoming weaker. The previous referendum was made under fraudulent claims, and individual politician’s’ personal agenda. Please give people right to vote now and you will see the results..
attributes.background: Government and parliament to start proceedings to re-join the EU again, ASAP.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631497
